title: Matt Finucane - Senior Software engineer
description: I am a Dublin based Senior Software Engineer.

content.content: I'm Matt Finucane, a Senior Software Engineer from Dublin, Ireland.
I have fifteen years of experience working with a wide variety of projects across multiple domains and in different workplace settings.
I have worked with agencies on their clients' projects, as well as in-house - both on-site and remotely from home and from shared office spaces.
My primary focus is on building single page applications in TypeScript that are performant, scalable and easy to maintain.
Please feel free to take a look around this website, which showcases my skills, experience, projects and where I am now.

If you are looking for somebody with strong technical and communication skills to take on a project at any stage in its lifecycle, please feel free to reach out to [me@mattfinucane.com](mailto:me@mattfinucane.com).
If you are contacting me from a recruitment agency or are reaching out to offer me web development / SEO services, I have all these covered. Thanks.
Effective communication skills; training, presentations, documentation and delegation.
Practice and advocate the highest development standards.
In-depth understanding of technologies across multiple domains.
Strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills.
Life-long learner with strong interest in continuous professional development.
These are the tools and languages I work with primarily over the last three years. I have used these every day on every project I have worked on.

content.description: Typescript is a superset of Javascript created by Microsoft. It borrows from C# and features strong typing.
content.title: TypeScript

content.description: Javascript (ES) is a modern version of Javascript.
content.title: ECMAScript

content.description: Web Components are a suite of different technologies that allow developers to create custom HTML elements.
content.title: Web Components

content.description: ReactJS is a front end library for creating components that make up a single page application.
content.title: ReactJS

content.description: React Hooks allow developers to leverage state management for functional components.
content.title: React Hooks

content.description: Redux is a state management system used in web application development.
content.title: Redux

content.description: CSS in JS allows you to use Javascript to define CSS styles for components. Two common frameworks I have used for this include styled-components, styled-system and design tokens.
content.title: CSS in JS

content.description: These act as CSS pre-processors and make it easier to manage styles for large, cross-browser applications.
content.title: SCSS/SASS

content.description: Progressive web apps are those that work (even offline) on any standards compliant browser
content.title: PWA

content.description: CSS Grid is modern technique for laying out web pages.
content.title: CSS Grid

content.description: NodeJS is a Javascript server side run time.
content.title: NodeJS

content.description: ExpressJS is a library used to create REST servers in NodeJS.
content.title: ExpressJS

content.description: Docker Compose is a tool that makes it easier to manage complex tools and environments, and ties each piece of infrastructure together (as containers) to form a working project.
content.title: Docker Compose

content.description: MongoDB is a document oriented non-relational database management system.
content.title: MongoDB

content.description: Mongoose is a library for NodeJS that makes it easier to interact with MongoDB.
content.title: Mongoose

content.description: Nginx is a web server commonly used as a reverse-proxy for Javascript based web application development.
content.title: Nginx

content.description: Linux is a Open-source Unix-like operating system.
content.title: Linux

content.description: Yarn and NPM are used to manage external dependencies for projects.
content.title: Yarn/NPM

content.description: Webpack is a module bundler that delivers assets for a web application to the browser.
content.title: webpack

content.description: Jest is a test runner commonly used in Typescript / Javascript projects, especially React.
content.title: Jest

content.description: React testing library is used to test the behaviour of function components in React.
content.title: Testing Library

content.description: Supertest is a tool for integration testing.
content.title: Supertest

content.description: VSCode is a powerful and simple integrated development environment (IDE).
content.title: VSCode

content.description: CircleCI is a tool that manages testing and deployment of web applications
content.title: CircleCI

content.description: Git is a widely used and very powerful source control management tool.
content.title: Git

content.description: ESLint is a code quality checker for Javascript and Typescript.
content.title: ESLint

content.description: stylelint is a tool used to check CSS rules for quality issues.
content.title: Stylelint

content.description: Lighthouse is a tool created by Google that examines websites and scores them based on performance and accessibility.
content.title: Lighthouse

content.description: BabelJS re-compiles TypeScript / Javascript (ES) into a flavour of Javascript that older browsers can execute.
content.title: BabelJS

content.content: These were languages and tools I used in the past, but have not used in the last three years.

content.description: PHP is a high level programming language commonly used in server-side web development.
content.title: PHP

content.description: Python is a high level language known for its power and simplicity.
content.title: Python

content.description: C++ is a general purpose strongly-typed programming language used in application development.
content.title: C++

content.description: Objective C is a superset of C created by Apple. It was used primarily in application development but has been superseded by Swift.
content.title: Objective C

content.description: C# is a high level, general purpose, strongly-typed language created my Microsoft.
content.title: C#

content.description: PolymerJS is a Javascript based web application framework built by Google, which leverages Web Components.
content.title: PolymerJS

content.description: MeteorJS is one of the earliest full-stack web application frameworks and works with MongoDB both client and server side.
content.title: MeteorJS

content.description: jQuery is a javascript library commonly used for cross-browser UI development, especially for non single-page applications.

content.description: ExtJS/Sencha is a web and mobile application framework written in Javascript that leverages HTML5 and comes with its own component library of widgets.

content.description: MySQL is an Open-source relational database management system.

content.description: Apache is an Open-source web server commonly used with PHP and MySQL.
content.title: Apache

content.description: Hugo is a static site generator that generates HTML from tempaltes combined with Markdown.
content.title: Hugo

content.description: Mocha is a Javascript test runner.
content.title: Mocha

content.description: Chai is a helper library to facilitate test assertions.
content.title: Chai

content.description: Sinon is a testing tool used to control tests by mocking function calls.
